QuestData.Title: Four Heads are Better than None
QuestData.Description: Now while the attack upon the Twilight Gate is launched, there is one last loose end to tie up: Za'brox and Beeble'phod, the disciples of Cho'gall.$B$BIntelligence has placed them within the Den of the Disciples, a small ogre cave at the southwest corner of the Twilight Gate.$B$BYou're fairly certain that Lady Cozwyn and Zaela will want proof of their deaths.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the four heads of Za'brox and Beeble'phod.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that blood dripping from your pack? I hope that it's not yours.
QuestData.RewardText: <The noble lady grins wickedly.>$B$BThat's quite a gruesome trophy collection you have there. I would have believed you if you had simply said they were dead, though I do appreciate the extra effort. Thank you for having the foresight to take care of them.$B$BThe Twilight Gate will soon be ours. Time to move up to the Twilight Citadel.
